medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient reports that RUQ pain started approximately 2 days ago but resolved spontaneously. At around 4 AM this morning, he experienced another episode of sharp nonradiating RUQ pain that was associated with multiple episodes of nonbilious nonbloody emesis and chills. Denies diarrhea, constipation, bloating, hematochezia, or hematemesis.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Past Medical History: Denies significant past medical history. Past Surgical History: Umbilical hernia repair.
medical_history.family_history: Mother and brother with cholecystectomy a number of years ago.
